title: Yeleo Lyrics Naan Sigappu Manithan Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Yeleo
Singers: GV Prakash, Megha & Chrous
Movie: Naan Sigappu Manithan
Music: GV Prakash

Yeleo, medhappu vandhiriche
engengo parakka vachiriche
kadhava thorandhukittu
kaatthu adikkudhudaa
manasu parakkudhu da doi.

Vilundhaalum elundhaalum
marupadiyum vilundhaalum
adada vilundhadhilum
laabam odru kidaikkudhe.

Ninnaalum nadandhaalum
neraa poi kavundhaalum.
adada adhirshtam vandhu
kadhava thatti alaikudhe

Thoongum bommaikudhaan
saavi yaaru kodhuthadhu
idhodaa kaiyya neetti
kaala aatti nadakkudhu.

Nigalkaalam edhir kaalam
nalamaaga ini maara
engo medhakureney enna pidingada

Naththaya pol irundhen
pattunu surundukuven
nachunu elundhu ippo nadakka thonudhada

Kappalaa naan irundhen
aadunaa kavundhukuven
puyala thaandi ippa neendha thonudhada

Panjara kedandha pandhu
sixer-u adikkudhudaa
sukkura dhisai enakku
salaam vaikkudhaa

Sandhiran enna vilai
sooriyan enna vilai
moththamaa vaanguren kettukodaa

Mazhaya mazhai adichu
medhuvaa kelambidichu
thoongu moonji maram poththu kulungudhe.

Parandhaa kiliyuminnu
paranil kedandha pattam
manjaa pottu ippa parakka thodangudhe

vedhayaa podhaivadhellaam
maramaa elundhida thaan
irudhaan vazhakayadaa machi mannaaru

Pojiyum aanaalum
pakkathula kodu kili
adhukku madhippu koodumadaaa.
